First Hydrogen Fuel Powered Ferry In The Word To Provide SF Passengers With Free Rides
- Jul 19, 2024 8:39 am GMT
SF
First Hydrogen Fuel Powered Ferry In The Word To Provide SF Passengers With Free Rides
The first ever hydrogen fuel powered ferry in the world for commercial passengers is now in the water and ready for operation in San Francisco Bay
